name: places/ChIJST5Vopv2wokRlgsjiAbmLmY
formattedAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10032-3729, USA

originalText.text:
Do not come to Columbia for any of your needs. They are careless and unprofessional. I was sent to a collections agency at their fault.

I receive monoclonal antibody infusions every 6 months. They billed the wrong insurance for one of my bills (even after giving the office my new insurance prior to my infusion) back on September 2022. Then, I brought to their attention that it was the wrong insurance and it was rebilled to the new insurance on May 2023. To top it off, they billed the insurance almost $900 more. Given that the new bill was not even finalized until May 2023 I should have been alotted more time to pay and the new insurance should not have been charged $900 more.

Additionally, I have been receiving financial assistance to pay the rest of the bill from my infusions ever since I started receiving treatment. The hospital never mentioned to me the drug was being switched. By the time, I received the new bill in May I submitted it first to the manufacturer of the first drug the hospital gave me and they said it wasn't their drug. Then I submitted it to the manufacturer of the second drug's financial assistance program and was told it was outside of their 6 month timeline to assist with the bill.

Not only do I have to deal with two super rare diseases but I also have to deal with the additional stress from the hospital's utter recklessness.

originalText.text: Had my gallbladder surgery here and it was wonderful. In and out, super nice people in pre and post op and super easy well done surgery, forever thankful
